Claws of Saurtopia Noise Fest Warm-Up #3

Income tax refund & Claws Of Saurtopia present


Thursday, 12th April 2018

Kurws [Poland] Gusstaff Records — jazz-punk

Come on, you should know this band by now—at least if you’re into any, like, Skin Graft band at all… Super-jagged rhythms, bass riffs like tempests and guitar noises from beyond—this time marbled with some saxophone sounds, hopefully.

https://kurws.bandcamp.com


Horacio Pollard [Berlin] Drid Machine — tribal noise

Funny enough, Horacio’s got an entry at Monoskop Log—that is quite dated though, but nevertheless:
»Half English, half Argentine ›noise-eccentric‹ Horacio Pollard has been active in the field of experimental music since 2002 and has released a number of CD/Rs on various labels as well as a split 7" with MOHA!. A member of Clifford Torus and Fully Blown Dental Reform, he also runs his own label Neigh%Music. Armed with a Korg DDD1 sampler / drum machine, he delivers here an exhilarating avalanche of distorted jams filled with heavy analogue riffs, hypnotic jazzy grooves and fierce noise-drenched rhymes.«

http://horaciopollard.blogspot.com
https://vimeo.com/horaciopollard
https://dridmachinerecords.bandcamp.com/album/horacio-pollard-frequencies-of-seizure


Nystagmus [Liège] La Belle Borgne — free drum+bass improv

This is the duo of drummer Tom Malmendier from the Belgian improv collective L'oeil kollectif and Farida Amadou from your favourite noise-punk psychos Cocaine Piss on bass guitar. As Nystagmus they hit their respective instruments in very unexpected ways.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4hA0-fWRDw
https://labelleborgne.bandcamp.com/album/dancing-eyes-cd1
https://www.amadoufarida.com
https://tomalmendier.wixsite.com/tomalmendier


Gazelle of Death

He’s from Russia and he’s a driver for bands and apparently he’s got a lot to tell the world, which is why people made comic books about him that he co-authored. Some of them he’ll bring to the show at Spxlxnkx.


Spxlxnkx /// Leipzig-West
DOORS/TÜR/PORTES 20:30h
START/START/START 21:00h
CURFEW/ENDE/FIN 23:30h

(dresscode: dinosaur)
don’t forget your earplugs!

April 2nd, 2018 10:19pm Claws Of Saurtopia noise
